short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that removes Explore tab and Trending section from Twitter on chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
anxiety-free-twitter-extension

Are you tired of distractions and mental anxiety caused by going into the dirty rabbit hole of Twitter's trending section? If yes, then this extension is here to help you.

This is a chrome extension that automatically hides 'explore' tab and trending box from twitter's website on Chrome web browser.

Just enable the extension and it will automatically work on Twitter.com.
